# The xml extension

Configure the `xml` extension.

This extension provides support for parsing XML.

## EXT_XML

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_XML_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.

## EXT_XML_EXPAT

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build xml extension with the Expat library support instead of the libxml2.
